Errors.title: Validation Errors
Errors.description: Error(s) which caused the payment validation to fail.

UltimateDebtorName.title: Ultimate Debtor Name
UltimateDebtorName.description: Name of the ultimate debtor making the payment.

UltimateDebtorAccount.title: Ultimate Debtor Account
UltimateDebtorAccount.description: Account details of the ultimate debtor making the payment.

UltimateDebtorAccountIdentifier.title: Ultimate Debtor Account Identifier Kind
UltimateDebtorAccountIdentifier.description: Account identifier used to uniquely identify the ultimate debtor. Valid values are IBAN or AccountId

UltimateDebtorAddressLine1.title: Ultimate Debtor Address Line 1
UltimateDebtorAddressLine1.description: First line of the ultimate debtor's address.

UltimateDebtorAddressLine2.title: Ultimate Debtor Address Line 2
UltimateDebtorAddressLine2.description: Second line of the ultimate debtor's address.

UltimateDebtorAddressLine3.title: Ultimate debtor address line 3
UltimateDebtorAddressLine3.description: Third line of the ultimate debtor's address.

UltimateDebtorCountryCode.title: Ultimate Debtor Country Code
UltimateDebtorCountryCode.description: Country code for the ultimate debtor's address. This is the 2-letter ISO country code.

InstructedCurrency.title: Instructed Currency
InstructedCurrency.description: Currency of the instructed payment. This is the 3-letter ISO currency code.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Reference provided by the ultimate debtor for the payment.

BatchId.title: Batch Id
BatchId.description: Unique identifier for the batch in which the payment was submitted.

EndToEndId.title: End to End Id
EndToEndId.description: Unique identifier provided to ClearBank for each payment.

SchemeEndToEndId.title: Scheme End to End Id
SchemeEndToEndId.description: Unique identifier created by ClearBank for each payment.

UltimateCreditorIBAN.title: Ultimate Creditor IBAN
UltimateCreditorIBAN.description: IBAN for the ultimate creditor. Mandatory only if Ultimate Creditor Account Number is not provided.

UltimateCreditorAccountNumber.title: Ultimate Creditor Account Number
UltimateCreditorAccountNumber.description: Account Number used to uniquely identify the ultimate creditor's account. Mandatory only if Ultimate Creditor IBAN is not provided.

UltimateCreditorAddressLine1.title: Ultimate Creditor Address Line 1
UltimateCreditorAddressLine1.description: First line of the ultimate creditor's address.

UltimateCreditorAddressLine2.title: Ultimate Creditor Address Line 2
UltimateCreditorAddressLine2.description: Second line of the ultimate creditor's address.

UltimateCreditorAddressLine3.title: Ultimate Creditor Address Line 3
UltimateCreditorAddressLine3.description: Third line of the ultimate creditor's address.

UltimateCreditorCountryCode.title: Ultimate Creditor Country Code
UltimateCreditorCountryCode.description: Country code for the ultimate creditor's address. This is the 2-letter ISO country code.

TransactionId.title: Transaction Id
TransactionId.description: Unique identifier defined by ClearBank for each payment.
